verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
"This <S%H2320>month<s%> shall be to you the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of <S%H2320>months.<s%> It shall be the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> of the year to <S%H8141>you.<s%>

<S%H1696>Speak<s%> to all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H6218><s%> 'On the tenth day of this <S%H2320>month,<s%> they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> to them every <S%H376>man<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> according to their <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses,<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> for a <S%H1004>household;<s%>

and if the <S%H1004>household<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> too <S%H4591>little<s%> for a <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> then he and his <S%H7934>neighbor<s%> <S%H7138>next<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> one according to the <S%H4373>number<s%> of the <S%H5315>souls;<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to what <S%H376>everyone<s%> can <S%H400>eat<s%> you shall make your <S%H3699>count<s%> for the <S%H7716>lamb.<s%>

Your <S%H7716>lamb<s%> shall be without <S%H8549>blemish,<s%> a <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H1121>a<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H3947>old.<s%> You shall take it from the <S%H3532>sheep,<s%> or from the <S%H5795>goats:<s%>

and you shall <S%H4931>keep<s%> it until the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the same <S%H2320>month;<s%> and the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> it <S%H996>at<s%> <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

They shall <S%H3947>take<s%> some of the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4201>doorposts<s%> and on the <S%H4947>lintel,<s%> on the <S%H1004>houses<s%> in which they shall eat <S%H398>it.<s%>

They shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in that <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H6748>roasted<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and unleavened <S%H4682>bread.<s%> They shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it with bitter <S%H4844>herbs.<s%>

<S%H398>Don't<s%> eat it <S%H4995>raw,<s%> nor <S%H1310>boiled<s%> at all with <S%H4325>water,<s%> but <S%H6748>roasted<s%> with <S%H784>fire;<s%> with its <S%H7218>head,<s%> its <S%H3767>legs<s%> and its inner <S%H7130>parts.<s%>

You shall let nothing of it <S%H3498>remain<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> but that which <S%H3498>remains<s%> of it until the <S%H1242>morning<s%> you shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

<S%H3602>This<s%> is how you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2296>it:<s%> with your belt on your <S%H4975>waist,<s%> your <S%H5275>shoes<s%> on your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and your <S%H4731>staff<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in <S%H2649>haste:<s%> it is <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6453>Passover.<s%>

For I will <S%H5674>go<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> in that <S%H3915>night,<s%> and will <S%H5221>strike<s%> all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal.<s%> Against all the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments:<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be to you for a <S%H226>token<s%> on the <S%H1004>houses<s%> where you <S%H7200>are:<s%> and when I see the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> I will <S%H6452>pass<s%> over <S%H5063>you,<s%> and there shall no plague be on you to <S%H4889>destroy<s%> <S%H5221>you,<s%> when I strike the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

This <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be to you for a <S%H2146>memorial,<s%> and you shall <S%H2287>keep<s%> it a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> you shall keep it a <S%H2287>feast<s%> by an <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

<S%H7651><s%>"'Seven <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread;<s%> <S%H389>even<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall put <S%H7673>away<s%> <S%H7603>yeast<s%> out of your <S%H1004>houses,<s%> for whoever <S%H398>eats<s%> leavened <S%H2557>bread<s%> from the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> until the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be to you a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation,<s%> and in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> no kind of <S%H4399>work<s%> shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H389>them,<s%> except that which every <S%H5315>man<s%> must <S%H398>eat,<s%> that only may be done by <S%H6213>you.<s%>

You shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> the feast of unleavened <S%H4682>bread;<s%> for in this <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> have I <S%H3318>brought<s%> your <S%H6635>armies<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> therefore you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> by an <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H6240>month,<s%> on the fourteenth <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>evening,<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread,<s%> until the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

There shall be no <S%H7603>yeast<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in your <S%H1004>houses<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> for whoever <S%H398>eats<s%> that which is <S%H2556>leavened,<s%> that <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whether he be a <S%H1616>foreigner,<s%> or one who is <S%H249>born<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>
You shall <S%H398>eat<s%> nothing <S%H2556>leavened.<s%> In all your <S%H4186>habitations<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread.<s%>'"

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4900>them,<s%> "Draw out, and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H6629>lambs<s%> according to your <S%H4940>families,<s%> and <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover.<s%>

You shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H92>bunch<s%> of <S%H231>hyssop,<s%> and <S%H2881>dip<s%> it in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that is in the <S%H5592>basin,<s%> and <S%H5060>strike<s%> the <S%H4947>lintel<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4201>doorposts<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that is in the <S%H5592>basin;<s%> and <S%H376>none<s%> of you shall go <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will pass <S%H5674>through<s%> to <S%H5062>strike<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> and when he <S%H7200>sees<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H4947>lintel,<s%> and on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4201>doorposts,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will pass <S%H6452>over<s%> the <S%H6607>door,<s%> and will not <S%H5414>allow<s%> the <S%H7843>destroyer<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> in to your <S%H1004>houses<s%> to strike <S%H5062>you.<s%>
You shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> for an <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> to you and to your <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

It shall happen when you have <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H1696>you,<s%> according as he has promised, that you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> this <S%H5656>service.<s%>
It will <S%H1121>happen,<s%> when your children <S%H559>ask<s%> <S%H5656>you,<s%> 'What do you mean by this service?'

that you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2077><s%> 'It is the sacrifice of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6453>Passover,<s%> who <S%H6452>passed<s%> over the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> when he <S%H5062>struck<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and <S%H5337>spared<s%> our <S%H1004>houses.<s%>'" The <S%H5971>people<s%> bowed their <S%H6915>heads<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3068>so;<s%> as Yahweh had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> so they <S%H6213>did.<s%>

It happened at <S%H2677>midnight,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> who <S%H3427>sat<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne<s%> to the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of the <S%H7628>captive<s%> who was in the <S%H1004>dungeon;<s%> and all the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H929>livestock.<s%>

<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H5650>he,<s%> and all his servants, and all the <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> and there was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6818>cry<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> for there was not a <S%H1004>house<s%> where there was not one <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

He <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Rise <S%H6965>up,<s%> get <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> both you and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H3212>go,<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as you have <S%H1696>said!<s%>
<S%H3947>Take<s%> both your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and your <S%H1241>herds,<s%> as you have <S%H1696>said,<s%> and be <S%H3212>gone;<s%> and bless me <S%H1288>also!<s%>"

The <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> were <S%H2388>urgent<s%> with the <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H7971>send<s%> them out of the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H4116>haste,<s%> for they <S%H559>said,<s%> "We are all dead <S%H4191>men.<s%>"

The <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> their <S%H1217>dough<s%> before it was <S%H2556>leavened,<s%> their kneading <S%H4863>troughs<s%> being bound <S%H6887>up<s%> in their <S%H8071>clothes<s%> on their <S%H7926>shoulders.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> and they <S%H7592>asked<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H8071>clothing.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> so that they let them <S%H7592>have<s%> what they <S%H5337>asked.<s%> They despoiled the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>traveled<s%> from <S%H7486>Rameses<s%> to <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> about <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> on <S%H7273>foot<s%> who were <S%H1397>men,<s%> <S%H905>besides<s%> <S%H2945>children.<s%>
A <S%H6154>mixed<s%> <S%H7227>multitude<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> also with <S%H6629>them,<s%> with flocks, <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and even <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>much<s%> <S%H4735>livestock.<s%>

They <S%H644>baked<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H5692>cakes<s%> of the <S%H1217>dough<s%> which they brought <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> for it <S%H2556>wasn't<s%> leavened, because they were thrust <S%H1644>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H3201>couldn't<s%> <S%H4102>wait,<s%> neither had they <S%H6213>prepared<s%> for themselves any <S%H6720>food.<s%>

Now the <S%H4186>time<s%> that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> was <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

It happened at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> even the <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> it <S%H6635>happened,<s%> that all the armies of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

It is a <S%H3915>night<s%> to be much <S%H8107>observed<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for <S%H3318>bringing<s%> them out from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> This is that <S%H3915>night<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to be much <S%H8107>observed<s%> of all the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> "This is the <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> of the <S%H6453>Passover.<s%> No <S%H1121>foreigner<s%> shall eat of <S%H398>it,<s%>
but every <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H5650>servant<s%> who is <S%H4736>bought<s%> for <S%H3701>money,<s%> when you have <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> <S%H398>him,<s%> then shall he eat of it.
A <S%H8453>foreigner<s%> and a hired <S%H7916>servant<s%> shall not eat of <S%H398>it.<s%>

In <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> shall it be <S%H398>eaten;<s%> you shall not carry <S%H3318>out<s%> anything of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house;<s%> neither shall you <S%H7665>break<s%> a bone of <S%H6106>it.<s%>
All the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall keep <S%H6213>it.<s%>

When a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> shall live as a <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> with <S%H6213>you,<s%> and will keep the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> let all his <S%H2145>males<s%> be <S%H4135>circumcised,<s%> and then let him come <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H6213>keep<s%> <S%H249>it;<s%> and he shall be as one who is born in the <S%H776>land:<s%> but no uncircumcised <S%H6189>person<s%> shall eat of <S%H398>it.<s%>
<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> shall be to him who is <S%H249>born<s%> at <S%H1616>home,<s%> and to the stranger who lives as a <S%H1481>foreigner<s%> among <S%H8432>you.<s%>"
All the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3068>so.<s%> As Yahweh <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> so they <S%H6213>did.<s%>

It happened the <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> by their <S%H6635>armies.<s%>
